Submodules¶

mdlib.Csystem module¶

class mdlib.Csystem.Csystem(acell: numpy.array, aorigin: numpy.array, abasis: numpy.array, amasses=None)¶

Bases: object

Represent a cyrstalline system: basis vectors + basis atoms

Parameters

  • cell (np.array) – 3x3 array column vectors are the three basis vectors

  • atoms (np.array) – 3xn array, column vectors are positions of basis atoms

  • origin (np.array) – a 3x1 array for the origin of the unit cell

  • natoms (int) – Number of basis atoms

  • ntypes (int) – Number of different atom types 1 - natoms

Attr masses

A dictionay for the mass of each atom type

Todo

add a method to transform the basis vectors for the crystalline system
